channel.title: I need a Little help
channel.description:
Okay, I got a source called Notoriouscape, and I would like to edit a few things.
SKILLS - I would like to know if it is possible to add the skills that are in the real RuneScape(yes, summoning also) and places to train them at.
STARTING OUT - When you start out you get items. I would like to know how to change the items you get when you start out on the server.
TELEPORT DESTINATIONS - I would like to know how to edit the area you arrive at after using a teleport spell.(Like changing the Varrok tele to the actual Varrok).
CUSTOM CLIENT - Is it possible to make a custom client for my server(yes, it uses Hamachi). If not please say so.
PLEASE DO NOT say I don't know how to code, this is not the lecture section, it is the help section. Anyone saying I do not know how to code will be ignored. Thank you. :)
*EDIT* EXP RATE - I found tutorials on this, bit I guess I have a different source, how do I change the exp rate?

item.title: I need a Little help
item.dc:creator: @sng sng
item.description:
@sng wrote:

maxxy2:

BTW, have you edited your server at all?

Yes, I changed the home teleport destination and I am working on changing something else, wont say though. Just started today.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2009, 02:56:13 pm[/size][hr]So, can anyone help?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @maxxy2 maxxy2

@maxxy2 wrote:

All of this is possible

Please search the tutorials first though, this is alot of info to cover. after you do that, i will help.
